item.title: [mh2] Squirrel Mob
item.description:
Creature — Squirrel

Squirrel Mob gets +1/+1 for each other Squirrel on the battlefield.

item.title: [mh2] Squirrel Sanctuary
item.description:
Enchantment

When Squirrel Sanctuary enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Squirrel Sanctuary to its owner's hand.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/modern-approach-part-1-2021-05-24

item.title: [mh2] Ravenous Squirrel
item.description:
Creature — Squirrel

Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Squirrel.

{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You gain one life and draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Chitterfang, Squirrel General
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Squirrel General

Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long aw defending player controls a forest.)

If one or more token would be created under your control, those tokens plus that many 1/1 green squirrel creature tokens are created instead.

{B}, Sacrifice X Squirrels: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/modern-approach-part-1-2021-05-24

item.title: [mh2] Fractured Sanity

item.title: [afr] Lolth, Spider Queen
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Lolth

Whenever a creature you control dies, put a loyalty counter on Lolth, Spider Queen.

0: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

−3: Create two 2/1 black Spider creature tokens with menace and reach.

−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent is dealt combat damage by one or more creatures you control, if that player lost less than 8 life this turn, they lose life equal to the difference."

item.title: [afr] Bruenor Battlehammer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Warrior

Each creature you control gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

You may pay {0} rather than pay the equip cost of the first equip ability you activate each turn.

item.title: [afr] Drizzt Do'Urden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Ranger

Double strike

Whenever Drizzt Do'Urden enters the battlefield, create Guenhwyvar, a legendary 4/1 green Cat creature token with trample.

Whenever a creature dies, if it had power greater than Drizzt's power, put a number of +1/+1 counters on Drizzt equal to the difference.

item.title: [mh2] Dakkon, Shadow Slayer
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Dakkon

Dakkon, Shadow Slayer enters the battlefield with a number of loyalty counters on him equal to the number of lands you control.

+1: Surveil 2.

−3: Exile target creature.

−6: You may put an artifact card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

item.title: [mh2] Timeless Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

Eternalize {2}{W}{W} ({2}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Dragon with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [mh2] Profane Tutor
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 2—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{B} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1029499176
